items.sentence: I asked Tom if there was something I could buy for him.
I don\'t think anybody else noticed what Tom was doing.
Didn\'t you know Tom lived in Boston when he was a kid?
I don\'t know how much time it\'ll take Tom to do that.
Tom was awoken by a Mary singing in the next apartment.
Tom bumped into Mary this morning on his way to school.
I don\'t think these guys really want to hear Tom sing.
I don\'t want Tom wandering around the mall by himself.
We are looking for someone who is proficient in French.
I\'m not sure Tom is going to be willing to talk to me.
